g4p_controls

Class GLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • g4p_controls.GAbstractControl
      • g4p_controls.GTextBase
        • g4p_controls.GTextIconBase
          • g4p_controls.GLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GConstants, processing.core.PConstants

    public class GLabel
extends GTextIconBase
    The label component. This control can display text with or without an icon.
    Author:
    Peter Lager

    • Constructor Detail

      • GLabel

        public GLabel(processing.core.PApplet theApplet,
              float p0,
              float p1,
              float p2,
              float p3)
        Create an empty label use setText and setIcon to change the text and icon.
        Parameters:
        theApplet - the main sketch or GWindow control for this control
        p0 - x position based on control mode
        p1 - y position based on control mode
        p2 - x position or width based on control mode
        p3 - y position or height based on control mode

      • GLabel

        public GLabel(processing.core.PApplet theApplet,
              float p0,
              float p1,
              float p2,
              float p3,
              java.lang.String text)
        Create a label control. use setIcon to add an icon
        Parameters:
        theApplet - the main sketch or GWindow control for this control
        p0 - x position based on control mode
        p1 - y position based on control mode
        p2 - x position or width based on control mode
        p3 - y position or height based on control mode
        text - the initial text to display

    • Method Detail

      • setHeightToFit

        @Deprecated
public void setHeightToFit()
        Deprecated. 
        This will change this control's height without changing the width so that it just fits round the text and icon (if any). This is only for backward compatibility and maybe removed in later releases. Use the method 
            resizeToFit(boolean horz, boolean vert)
        instead.

      • resizeToFit

        public void resizeToFit(boolean horz,
                        boolean vert)
        This will change this label's size so that it just fits round the text and icon either horizontally, vertically or both.
        Parameters:
        horz - adjust the width
        vert - adjust the height

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Overrides:
        draw in class GAbstractControl
